question: When was the International Hydrographic Organization founded?
solver_answer: The International Hydrographic Organization (IHO) traces its origins to June 21, 1921, when it was founded as the International Hydrographic Bureau. The name was officially changed to International Hydrographic Organization in 1970 when a new convention entered into force.
subject: web_search
derived_ev: The International Hydrographic Bureau was formally founded on June 21, 1921, as stated in the IHO's official publication 'The History of the IHO' (M-10_2019_EN.pdf)
